title: The general assembly: or, A discourse of the gathering of all saints to Christ Wherein it appears that all saints in all places and ages, shall be at last gathered together to Christ their head. Together with the time, manner, ends and reasons of this last great congregating of all saints, and what use may be made thereof. Being some meditations upon 2 Thess. II. 1. By O. H. minister of the Gospel.
author: Heywood, Oliver, 1629-1702.
publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside,
